column2: Okay, ready to play another level of Fizzics?
True. True. Go go ahead and launch Fizzics
The challenge is that you've to get all the diamonds, but you can only use the fling tool once.
How can you get all the diamonds really close to each other.
You can make them closer together by using the attraction tool.
Whoa. That worked perfectly. And check it out!   Here's the third fob.
Alright let's go see if this fob works.
Finished for now? Check back later when you're ready to work out some more puzzles.
